title: The Week in 60 Minutes: Second Cold War and steely Sturgeon
description:
On this week's episode, Cindy Yu is joined by the journalist Isabel Oakeshott, Spectator contributor Stephen Daisley, historian Niall Ferguson, and Professor Jay Bhattacharya.

We discuss why Boris can't afford childcare, why India is reluctant to lock down again, and if a second cold war is on the horizon.

To watch the show, go to www.spectator.co.uk/tv.
itunes:author: The Spectator
